summary: Just another configuration for the Xbox Controller. This is for better use of 8 hotkeys
descriptionHtml:
Just another configuration for the Xbox Controller. This is for better use of 8 hotkeys

Configuration controller:
A = jump
B = toggle POV
X = ready weapon
Y = nothing
LB = activate
RB = shout
Back = tween menu
Y+Back = favorites
Start = journal
LS = move
RS = look
LS click = sprint
RS click = sneak
LT = left hand
RT = right hand

D-PAD Up         = Hotkey 1
D-PAD Right     = Hotkey 2
D-PAD Down     = Hotkey 3
D-PAD Left	      = Hotkey 4
Y+D-PAD Up      = Hotkey 5
Y+D-PAD Right  = Hotkey 6
Y+D-PAD Down  = Hotkey 7
Y+D-PAD Left    = Hotkey 8

Install:
Extract this file to your Skyrim\\Data folder

Uninstall:
Remove the Skyrim\\Data\\Interface\\Controls\\PC folder
author: Jimmy High
